432810.name: The Order of the Thorne - The King's Challenge Demo
432810.description: Try out The Order of the Thorne: The King's Challenge before you buy it! Join Finn, the bard, on his quest to write the greatest song ever, by undertaking The King's Challenge!  Journey to the Faerie Realm and help find the missing queen!  Play your magic lute and explore your way through the kingdom in this classic point and click adventure.
432810.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
